item.title: Potholes, 26th January
item.description:
Email received by CSC inbox 24/01/26 Pothole Lat/Long - 51.4145501, 0.0777538 what3words - harp.forms.even Nearest address - 15 Marlowe Close, Chislehurst, BR7 6ND A massive pot hole in the road my car fell into it with a large thud sound. I wouldn’t be surprised if my wheel has damage too it. I need to get it checked. Reference - 5270373 Map link - open Google map Report history - Status: Received 24/01/2026 10:58 A massive pot hole in the road my car fell into it with a large thud sound. I wouldn’t be surprised if my wheel has damage too it. I need to get it checked.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Ashfield Lane, Chislehurst, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Lighting not working, 26th January
item.description:
Email received by CSC inbox 23/01/26 Street Lighting - Maintenance Lat/Long - 51.4190036, -0.0751887 what3words - bolts.driver.modes Nearest address - 26 Anerley Hill, Anerley, London, SE19 2AD 2 street lights, 4 sign illumination lights, and all five lit up directional bollards are unilluminated at the junction of Annerly Hill and the road into the national sports centre. Please see the location of reports, photos attached, and the following column numbers. For street lights: a299, and a2910. For traffic signs: p1873, p1871, p1872. For Bollards b1086, b1085, b 1088 and b1089 + one bollard which does not have any stickers. Reference - 5269461 Map link - open Google map Report history - Status: Received 23/01/2026 18:19 2 street lights, 4 sign illumination lights, and all five lit up directional bollards are unilluminated at the junction of Annerly Hill and the road into the national sports centre. Please see the location of reports, photos attached, and the following column numbers. For street lights: a299, and a2910. For traffic signs: p1873, p1871, p1872. For Bollards b1086, b1085, b 1088 and b1089 + one bollard which does not have any stickers.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 26, Anerley Hill, Crystal Palace, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large bag of womens clothes dumped on pavement, 26th January
item.description:
Random bag left against our wall. If it is a charity donation it has got drenched and been there for days. It was rifled through in the middle of the night by humans and foxes. Please can it be collected, its to big for my bin.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Palace Grove, Plaistow, Greater London

item.title: Light not working, 26th January
item.description:
Email received by CSC inbox 23/01/26 Street Lighting - Maintenance Lat/Long - 51.4186176, -0.0740685 what3words - paints.lofts.never Nearest address - 15 Anerley Hill, Anerley, London, SE19 2BA Lamppost without column number on the junction of road to Crystal Palace Sports Centre and Ledrington Rd, is unilluminated. Please see to photos attached and should this report be passed on to the National Sports Centre, please do so. Reference - 5269427 Map link - open Google map Report history - Status: Received 23/01/2026 17:54 Lamppost without column number on the junction of road to Crystal Palace Sports Centre and Ledrington Rd, is unilluminated. Please see to photos attached and should this report be passed on to the National Sports Centre, please do so.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Ledrington Road, Crystal Palace, Greater London
